response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high quality and value, we believe it's worth more than $100. In fact, based on its features and benefits, we think it's valued at around $120 by many customers. Considering this, I would like to offer you the opportunity to purchase it for $110. This price reflects the excellent value and quality of the product while allowing us to cover our costs and make a reasonable profit. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to your response.", "product_price": 110}
